'''Batwing Iris''' is [[Ororon]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Ororon wears a black hooded cape that is torn behind with different patterns in blue and cyan, his {{Electro}} [[Vision]] is behind his hood and is silver instead of the usual golden color. He wears a black sleeveless turtleneck shirt with a purple eye pattern under a gray sleeveless vest with a mini cape over his right shoulder.

He wears gray ripped jeans with black oversized boots. His accessories are black fingerless gloves and a cyan scarf with intricate patterns of eyes and lightnings in different shades of blue, purple, indigo and yellow.
